description.character: Provide a compelling and detailed description of this character, taking into account their backstory, race, and class. Include specific details about their hair (color, texture, style), eyes (color, shape, expression), skin (tone, texture, any notable markings), facial features (shape, any distinguishing marks), jewelry (type, materials, significance), clothing (style, colors, materials, any unique elements), and unique features (scars, tattoos, or other distinctive characteristics). Ensure the description captures their personality and history, reflecting how their experiences have shaped their appearance.
description.object: Provide a compelling and detailed description of this object, highlighting its appearance, materials, and any unique characteristics. Include specific details about its size, shape, color, and texture. Describe any engravings, inscriptions, or symbols present on the object. Explain the materials used in its construction, emphasizing any rare or magical components. Highlight any unique features, such as glowing runes, moving parts, or other magical effects. Additionally, describe the object's history or lore, including its origin, any notable previous owners, and its intended use or powers.
description.scene: Provide a compelling and detailed description of this scene, ensuring to capture the essence of the location and atmosphere. Include details about the setting's physical layout (landscape, architecture, notable landmarks), the weather (temperature, sky conditions, any weather phenomena), lighting (time of day, sources of light), sounds (ambient noises, distant or close sounds), smells (distinct aromas, any noticeable scents), and textures (surfaces, materials). Incorporate any unique elements or features that make the scene memorable and distinctive. Additionally, consider the mood and emotional tone of the scene, reflecting how it might impact or be perceived by characters present.

image.style: Create an illustration with a dark fantasy atmosphere, featuring bold lines and dramatic contrasts. Use a rich but subdued colour palette to convey depth and mood. Apply soft lighting with delicate highlights and shadows for dimensionality. Blur the background slightly to maintain environmental context but keep the focus on the central figure.

styles.comicbook: Create an illustration with a dark fantasy atmosphere, featuring bold lines and dramatic contrasts. Use a rich but subdued colour palette to convey depth and mood. Apply soft lighting with delicate highlights and shadows for dimensionality. Blur the background slightly to maintain environmental context but keep the focus on the central figure.
styles.watercolor: Create an illustration with a dark fantasy atmosphere, using a watercolor style with soft, fluid lines and gentle gradients. Incorporate dramatic contrasts with a rich yet subdued color palette to convey depth and mood. Apply soft, diffused lighting with delicate washes of color, allowing highlights and shadows to blend naturally for a layered, atmospheric effect. Blur the background slightly to maintain environmental context without sharp details, keeping the focus on the central figure while embracing the translucent, organic quality of watercolor.
styles.shadowdark: Create an illustration with a dark fantasy atmosphere, rendered entirely in a monochromatic black-and-white palette. Use bold, intricate linework and dramatic contrasts to convey a sense of depth and intensity. Incorporate dense textures through cross-hatching and fine details to enhance the organic or grotesque elements. Employ sharp, high-contrast lighting with stark highlights and deep shadows to emphasize the central figure. Keep the background filled with subtle, abstract patterns or hints of the environment, ensuring it complements the central focus without overpowering it. Focus on a raw, graphic style evocative of traditional woodcuts or etchings.

angle.battle: For this battle scene, use a low angle/wide shot from a lower vantage point, looking up to make the characters appear more imposing and dynamic, capturing the scale and intensity of the battle. Central characters in combat should be prominent, with dynamic poses, and include elements of the battlefield like terrain, other fighters, and environmental hazards. High contrast lighting with dramatic shadows and highlights should emphasise action and movement, with directional lighting creating a sense of urgency. The background should be detailed to show the chaotic environment, with motion blur on peripheral elements to suggest movement.
angle.character: For this character portrait, use a close-up shot focusing on the character from the chest up, with the face centred and well-lit, capturing the character's expression and key features, using a slight upward angle to convey importance and heroism. Soft, even lighting should highlight facial features and textures, with a slight rim light to add depth. The background should be blurred or softly focused to ensure the character stands out, possibly including faint hints of the character's environment or symbolic elements.
angle.fullbody: For this full-body character portrait, depict the character standing in a powerful yet natural pose, with their entire figure fully visible and well-lit. The character should be shown from head to toe, with attention to detail in their attire, weaponry, and accessories, ensuring their personality and role are conveyed through their stance. Use balanced, even lighting that highlights the contours of the body, armour, or clothing, with a slight rim light to create separation from the background. The background should be softly focused, allowing hints of the environment—such as a battlefield, forest, or mystical landscape—but not overpowering the character as the focal point.
angle.city: For this city overview scene, use a high angle/wide shot from a bird's-eye view or high vantage point to capture the city's expanse and layout, highlighting architecture, streets, and key landmarks. Ensure the city's iconic structures are prominent, conveying its scale and grandeur. Natural lighting should add dramatic shadows and highlights, enhancing the city's depth and detail.
angle.general: For this scene, use a mid-range angle/medium-wide shot that provides a balanced perspective, capturing the overall environment and characters without focusing too much on any specific element. This shot should be at eye level to maintain a natural and relatable viewpoint. Ensure the scene is well-lit with even, neutral lighting to avoid casting strong shadows, creating a clear and consistent view of the setting. The background should include enough detail to establish the context and location, but it should not dominate the frame. Elements like furniture, landscape features, or general scenery should be present to create a sense of place, while still keeping the primary focus on the overall scene rather than individual components.
angle.item: For this magic item portrait, use a medium close-up shot focusing on the item floating slightly above a pedestal, captured from a low, upward angle to suggest power and mystery. The item should be centred in the frame, well-lit with dramatic, soft lighting that highlights intricate details, such as runes or glowing components. A subtle, cool-toned rim light should outline the edges of the item, adding depth and an ethereal quality. The background should be softly blurred, featuring faint mystical elements or hints of the environment, ensuring the magic item is the clear focal point of the image.
angle.monster: For this monster portrait, use a full-body shot capturing the entire figure of the monster from head to toe, with the monster centred and well-lit. Position the camera at a slight downward angle to convey a sense of grandeur and dominance. Ensure the lighting is soft and even, highlighting the textures and details of the monster's body, with a slight rim light to add depth. The background should be softly focused or blurred, ensuring the monster stands out clearly, and it may include faint hints of the monster's environment or symbolic elements to add context.
angle.social: For this social encounter scene, opt for a medium shot capturing characters from the waist up, allowing for gestures and interactions, with the angle slightly above eye level to include the setting. Ensure the main characters involved in the interaction have clear faces and expressions, with surrounding elements like tables, chairs, and decor hinting at the setting. Use warm and inviting lighting to reflect the nature of the encounter, with soft shadows to maintain a friendly atmosphere. The background should be partially blurred to focus on the characters but detailed enough to establish the setting.
